sentence.Network_en: Recheck clearance again after tightening locknut . Readjust clearance as necessary.

sentence.Network_en: Recheck clearance on all valves again after locknut is tightened.
sentence.Network_cn: 防松螺母拧紧后,再对所有气门的间隙重新检查一次.

sentence.Network_en: Tighten valve adjusting screw locknut to 27 N · m ( 20 lb - ft ).
sentence.Network_cn: 将气门调节螺丝防松螺母拧紧至27牛顿·米 ( 20磅 - 尺 ).
